title: ahri changes (nerfs)
body:
Riot nerfed her because they didnt like how she was being played then made her an assassin then nerfed her again because why the fuck not? then she become something less powerful then when she was originally released AND when she was an assassin. gg rito, way to %%%% with all ahri mains/players.

can i get a refund now?, im not even joking i want a refund for the champ and the skins i purchased as well.

replies.body:
Ahri is still very strong and imo even stronger, yes without the E 20% bonus damage you can do she does feel weak earlier but if you play safe and farm up you will see that she hasn't changed much at all.

You won't get a refund so there's no point in asking, I suggest practicing her again and again so you can get use to her new playstyle and trust me eventually it will be the same as the old ahri just without the bonus on the E.
Just remember that the old old e never amp'd her dmg , only charmed longer.

To be honest, this was not even a nerf at all, more like a rebalance similar to viktor's rework. If you paid any attention at all, riot stated ahri was intended to be a kite Mage when created, and the fact that she was dashin in to blow champs up before easily escaping was unsatisfactory and unbalanced. What they want is for players to juke with ahri and using her skills defensively, and as a matter of fact she deals more damage than she used to when you play her as a kiter now, due to her increased scalings. Also, if you want to be refunded simply because she got nerfed, that means you only bought her to exploit her power, and don't actually enjoy the champion design.

>
> To be honest, this was not even a nerf at all, more like a **rebalance similar to viktor's rework**.

Viktor's changes were absolutely amazing, practically all were slight over buffs but people still don't play him much because I dunno you tell me {{champion:112}} {{item:3198}} {{item:3198}} {{item:3198}}
Well tbh his e was nerfed pretty hard, tho I gotta admit the rest of the changes were awesome, I still prefer one shotting people with my old e :P

Ahri was not nerfed IMO, she was rebalanced. She no longer does 20% increased damage with her Charm, but honestly the boosted damage from her Foxfire and the new accuracy make up for it right? Also, she got a MS boost when her orb is in flight so all around it is not that heavy a nerf. Don't know what you are complaining about man.
But you buy things with the intention to keep them, and with skins, its solely because of how they look, nothing else.
